name: The Walkin Cat
description:
Made for IGSI Game Jam 2022

Theme: Control the environment

Oyen, the orange cat has found himself in a difficult situation. He's stuck in purgatory! Help Oyen find his way home, by making sure his paths are safe from all obstruction!

The Walkin Cat is a simple puzzle game. You need to figure out how to make Oyen's path as safe as possible by interacting with the environment. Some solution will make sense, but the rest will be utterly non-sensical.

This gamejam version consists of 3 distinct levels.

Credits
